column4: Ubuntu ROCKS!!  I finally got my damn games working.  Stupid little problem all along...
wish I could get my Ashen Empires working uder Wine
well, im working on Oblivion right now...I'll let you know how it goes, but what's the problem with Ashen Emp?  Have you tried wine-doors for your directx install?

Wine-Doors?  I've not heard of it.  basicly I get to the point where  it asks me to pick a server (only 2 servers) and no matter which one I click it gives me a login error and then I can't click on a different server even though it sayes to do just that
